General.Name: Shanxi Zhendong Pharmaceutical
General.Description: Shanxi Zhendong Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, manufactures, and markets pharmaceutical products and Chinese medicines in China. It offers cancer drugs, cardiovascular drugs, infectious disease drugs, and respiratory drugs; antibiotics, antitumor drugs, vitamins, etc.; Chinese medicines; calcium preparations; and active pharmaceutical ingredients, as well as sells gastrointestinal drugs. The company offers its products in various dosage forms, such as large volume injections, small volume injections, powder injections, lyophilized powders, tablets, hard capsules, granules, dry suspensions, ointments, psychotropic substances, and other formulations Shanxi Zhendong Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd is based in Changzhi, China.
